thread.title: Carson continues opposition to Iraq, Afghanistan wars
thread.title_full: Carson continues opposition to Iraq, Afghanistan wars - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Carson continues opposition to Iraq, Afghanistan wars
text: Appearing on " This Week with George Stephanopoulos, " Dr. Ben Carson, second place in most GOP presidential polls and the Washington Examiner's power rankings, said he opposed the 2003 invasion of Iraq, agreeing with Donald Trump, and indicated that he might not have invaded Afghanistan in 2001, a position he has been toying with for some time. ...
